official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the Harlem Hospital Center be recognized for 100 Years of Community Service.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the Harlem Hospital Center be recognized and commended for 100 years of service and for its dedication to providing quality care.
